mapper.select: select ptometry_number from jc_tryresults where ptometry_number=#{ptometryNumber}
mapper.delete:
delete from jc_tryresults where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select u.name from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id=ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id where r.role_name= #{roleName}

SELECT t.id,t.card_number,t.ptometry_number,t.optometry_name,t.create_time,t.status as trystatus,r.status as rstatus, s.id AS haveid FROM jc_tryresults t LEFT JOIN jc_result r ON t.ptometry_number = r.ptometry_number LEFT JOIN store_sales s ON r.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number where t.card_number=#{cardNumber} group by t.ptometry_number order by t.id desc
select count(*) from jc_tryresults where card_number=#{cardNumber} and status=#{status}
